alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 8:19PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Phillips County through 845 PM CDT... At 819 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Helena-West Helena, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St Francis National Park, Helena-West Helena, Latour, Huma, Quarles, Helena Crossing and Wycamp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...and northwestern Mississippi.
